about_the_game:
What kind of game is this?
It is a motion-sensing game played by using your phone and computer that is designed to bring an immersive experience at a low cost. In the game you will play as a cute animal to the amusement park built by robot entertainment company, play a variety of motion-sensing games (currently only bowling, other motion-sensing games are under intense development). Besides,the game supports two-player games (will support multi-player in the future), come to play with your friends ~
How to play this game?
  • You need to run it on your computer and phone at the same time.
  • Phone and computer need to be in the same LAN
  • If your phone is an Android phone, you need to open a specific web page in your browser (prompted in the game), but I recommend installing a app (the download page will provide it) because the source interface provides more accurate sensing data.
  • If your phone is an iPhone, all you need to do is open a specific web page in Safari (the game prompts you).

This is my first work on Steam, and if you have any advice and comments, you are very welcome to tell me in the community.
Follow me at Youtube for the latest development information.

name: 动物的游戏乐园（体感游戏）Party Of Forest(Motion Sensing Game)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10/11
  • Processor: any type
  • Graphics: any type
  • Sound Card: any type
